hadiths.text: Narrated Qatada:We were in the company of Anas whose baker was with him. Anas said, The Prophet (ﷺ) did not eat thin bread, or a roasted sheep till he met Allah (died)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْخُبْزِ الْمُرَقَّقِ وَالأَكْلِ عَلَى الْخِوَانِ وَالسُّفْرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Thin bread and eating at a dining table.
